properties.name: Thai Tan Tien
properties.popupContent: Guesthouse. Nice bungalows, quiet beach, restaurant, best value for money on Long Beach. First hackers are staying here.

properties.name: Oyster Club
properties.popupContent: Beach-front cafe and bar. No wi-fi. Rents out windsurfing boards (and optionally instructs beginners).

properties.name: John's Tours
properties.popupContent: Booking agency for pretty much anything. Sets up a generator during power outages, so there's always wi-fi. Sells prepaid SIM cards with data usage included.

properties.name: Paradise City Club
properties.popupContent: Bar and night club. Table football.

properties.name: Le Cap Breton
properties.popupContent: French restaurant. Good food. Specialties: galettes, crÃªpes, quiche.

properties.name: German B
properties.popupContent: German cafe and bar. Fast wi-fi, pool billards for free, fresh milk and cream, decent German food.
